record.field: CRM: Lead Creation Notification Template - Qweb
A new Lead has just been created in the system

table.style: box-sizing:border-box;padding-top: 16px; background-color: #F1F1F1; font-family:Verdana, Arial,sans-serif; color: #454748; width: 100%; border-collapse:separate;

td.div:
Dear Sales
A new Lead has just been created in the system. Please follow up and take care of this Lead carefully. It is recommended to update the state of the Lead frequently.
Hello Sales
A new lead has been created in the system:
- Lead Name: Lead Name.
- Contact: Contact.
- Phone: Phone.
Please follow up with this lead promptly.
Best regards, The CRM Team
Xem Lead

record.field: CRM: 5 ngày trôi qua, bạn đã chăm sóc khách hàng này chưa - QWeb
CRM: 5 days have passed, have you taken care of this Lead yet?

td.div:
